scripts.local: npx webpack && k6 run -e API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080 -e test_mode=load dist/api.tests.js
scripts.dev: npx webpack && k6 run -e test_mode=load dist/api.tests.js
scripts.publish: npx webpack && k6 run -e test_mode=load dist/api.tests.js -o cloud
scripts.start: npx webpack && k6 cloud -e test_mode=load dist/api.tests.js
